thread.title: Opus moves dirt on CenterPoint Energy facility
thread.title_full: Opus moves dirt on CenterPoint Energy facility

author: Brian Johnson
title: Opus moves dirt on CenterPoint Energy facility
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / Brief / Opus moves dirt on CenterPoint Energy facility Opus started construction this week on this new 64,000-square-foot office-warehouse facility for CenterPoint Energy. The project site is at Douglas Drive North and Golden Valley Road in Golden Valley. (Submitted rendering: Opus) Opus moves dirt on CenterPoint Energy facility By: Brian Johnson July 29, 2015 4:27 pm 0 The new building at Douglas Drive North and Golden Valley Road will create new office space for employees, replacing two other facilities that are aging and constrained for space.
